name: COVID CRUSHER
description:
Angry COVID molecules have invaded this simple city street. Crush all of the COVID before they hit the streets to save the citizens! Save the entire city in the campagin  mode or blast COVID endlessly in a fun endless mode! 

Update:2.1

Spacebar activates power-up shot

Right Click activates power-up time.

COVID spawn fix.

A percentage of sales with go to support COVID relief.
